dimension: 23 3/4 x 10 11/16 x 8 1/2 in. (60.33 x 27.15 x 21.59 cm) (without bottom peg)
title: John the Baptist as a Child, one of a pair
text: The figure of the Infant Saint John the Baptist was carved as a companion figure for the Infant Jesus Christ (on the opposite pedestal).
description: standing infant with arms out, PL arm slightly upraised; thick, short hair; standing on rocky element; wearing brown and gilt garment trimmed in dark brown fur; gilt shoulder cloth
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
